callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | Id == "DISTRICTS_INDUSTRY" => GetColour("green") | Id == "DISTRICTS_MILITARY" => GetColour("red") | Id == "DISTRICTS_SORCERY" => GetColour("epic") | GetColour("blue")
